item.description:
At the Waltham Common is the premiere of our own Bob Barnes, Race Chair and fitness guru, who will be on hand to share tips and wisdom to prepare us for the upcoming ski race season!

This is applicable to those interested in winter fitness, current members of the Wedeln Ski and Sports Club, those considering taking that awesome step toward officially becoming members of the greatest ski club in the Northeast, or those simply interested in getting to know the folks in the club a little better. If you have time tonight, please RSVP. It will be a great time!

Bring 1 or two egg crates and 2 poles (wood poles, ski poles, hiking poles, etc) and water! If you don't have egg crates we can also use the stone benches and walls.
item.name: Dry land ski training - Waltham
